com.example.android.arrival.Util

Class AccountManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.android.arrival.Util.AccountManager

  • public class AccountManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton object used to manage all actions pertaining to an account

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String TAG

      this method deletes current user's account data from everywhere in firebase

      • getAccountType

        public java.lang.String getAccountType(java.lang.String uid,

        uid - user id
        listener - callback listener that the function gives final output to
